= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Flexor profundus digitorum (flexor-profundus-digitorum-muscle)*: flexor of the wrist (midcarpal), metacarpophalangeal and interphalangeal joints; flexes the 2-5 digits
  * *Flexor longus pollicis (flexor-longus-pollicis-muscle)*: flexor of the phalanges of the thumb
  * *Flexor sublimis digitorum (flexor-sublimis-digitorum-muscle)*: flexion of the middle phalanges of the fingers at the proximal interphalangeal joints
  * *Palmaris longus (palmaris-longus-muscle)*: weak flexor
  * *Infraspinatus muscle (infraspinatus-muscle)*: lateral rotation of arm; adduction of arm and stabilizes humerus
  * *Supraspinatus muscle (supraspinatus-muscle)*: abduction of arm and stabilizes humerus
  * *Subscapularis muscle (shoulder-subscapularis-muscle)*: rotates medially humerus; stabilizes shoulder
  * *Teres major muscle (shoulder-teres-major-muscle)*: internal rotation of the humerus
  * *Latissimus dorsi muscle (shoulder-latissimus-dorsi-muscle)*: pulls the forelimb dorsally and caudally
  * *Hand somatic receptors (hand-somatic-receptors)*: somatic sensations
  * *Deltoid muscle, anterior (anterior-deltoid-muscle)*: shoulder flexion
  * *Deltoid muscle, lateral and posterior (posteriolateral-deltoid-muscle)*: shoulder abduction, extension
  * *Teres minor muscle (teres-minor-muscle)*: laterally rotates and adducts the arm
  * *Triceps brachii muscle (triceps-brachii-muscle)*: extends forearm, caput longum adducts shoulder
  * *Articularis cubiti muscle (articularis-cubiti-muscle)*: lifts capsule away from joint
  * *Abductor pollicis longus muscle (abductor-pollicis-longus-muscle)*: abduction, extension of thumb
  * *Extensor carpi ulnaris muscle (extensor-carpi-ulnaris-muscle)*: extends the little finger at all joints
  * *Extensor digiti minimi muscle (extensor-digiti-minimi-muscle)*: extends and adducts the wrist
  * *Extensor digitorum muscle (extensor-digitorum-muscle)*: extension of hand and fingers
  * *Extensor indicis muscle (extensor-indicis-muscle)*: extends index finger, wrist
  * *Extensor pollicis brevis muscle (extensor-pollicis-brevis-muscle)*: extension of thumb at metacarpophalangeal joint
  * *Extensor pollicis longus muscle (extensor-pollicis-longus-muscle)*: extension of the thumb (metacarpophalangeal and interphalangeal)
  * *Supinator muscle (supinator-muscle)*: supinates forearm
  * *Extensor carpi radialis brevis muscle (extensor-carpi-radialis-brevis-muscle)*: extensor at the wrist joint, abducts the hand at the wrist
  * *Anconeus muscle (anconeus-muscle)*: partly blended in with the triceps, which it assists in extension of the forearm; stabilises the elbow and abducts the ulna during pronation
  * *Brachioradialis muscle (brachioradialis-muscle)*: stabilizer of elbow joint
  * *Extensor carpi radialis longus muscle (extensor-carpi-radialis-longus-muscle)*: extensor and abductor of the hand at the wrist joint
